item.title: How do i make my client unleechable?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:6, topic:249756”]Wow. Just don’t include the source files. (.java)
People can still decompile it though, even if you JAR it. The real RuneScape client is also obfuscated, and we are still able to decompile it. However it has to be refactored.

So, the answer to your question is you can’t.[/quote]

True, but many people who are downloading everyone’s bases and such really don’t care/know how to decompile. But you are right =/

Read full topic

So, the answer to your question is you can’t.

item.title: How do i make my client unleechable?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

JarMaker, google it, or search in Client Help Section.

The second code deletes your Java files so the client will run from the .class files. Unless you make a back-up, this will completely close your client and cannot be edited anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my client unleechable?

item.source: How do i make my client unleechable?

item.title: How do i make my client unleechable?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

JarMaker.

Or, make a bat file and put this in it:

@echo off del *.java cls

Your client will run off of class files then.

Your best option would be the first one though ;D

Read full topic
